mapper.select: select * from (select * from teacherplan where code=#{code}) ttt left join user u on ttt.teacherno=u.id
select td.*,tq.questionname from teacherdetail td ,teacherquestion tq where td.questionid=tq.id and td.teatestid=#{planid}
select sss.*,q.questionname from (select avg(s.score) as avgscore, questionid from teacherdetail s where s.teatestid=#{planid} group by s.questionid) sss ,teacherquestion q where sss.questionid=q.id

SELECT COUNT(s.stuno) AS sum, l.classname AS classname FROM student s LEFT JOIN tbl_class l ON s.class_id = l.id WHERE s.class_id = (SELECT t.classid FROM teacherplan t WHERE t.id = #{id}) GROUP BY s.class_id

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT t.sessionid) AS count ,u.`name` AS name FROM (select DISTINCT m.sessionid,m.teatestid from teacherdetail m where m.teatestid =#{id} LIMIT 0,#{rade}) t LEFT JOIN teacherplan p ON t.teatestid=p.id LEFT JOIN `user` u ON p.teacherno=u.id GROUP BY t.teatestid
